languages.text: "Я видел{mf||а}, что ты жаждешь крови. Ты наслаждаешься тем, что судишь и казнишь. Скажешь, я лгу?"
"I have seen your thirst for blood. You revel in the sentencing and the executing. Are you going to dispute that? Am I lying?"
languages.original_text: "Я видел{mf||а}, что ты жаждешь крови. Ты наслаждаешься тем, что судишь и казнишь. Скажешь, я лгу?"

traits.locale_text: "I have seen your thirst for blood. You revel in the sentencing and the executing. Are you going to dispute that? Am I lying?"
"I have seen your thirst for blood. You revel in the sentencing and the executing. Are you going to dispute that? Am I lying?"
"I have seen your thirst for blood. You revel in the sentencing and the executing. Are you going to dispute that? Am I lying?"

"I have seen your thirst for blood. You revel in the sentencing and the executing. Are you going to dispute that? Am I lying?"
"I have seen your thirst for blood. You revel in the sentencing and the executing. Are you going to dispute that? Am I lying?"

languages.text: “我看到了你对鲜血的渴望，你陶醉于宣判和处决。你打算反驳我吗？我是在撒谎吗？”
languages.original_text: "I have seen your thirst for blood. You revel in the sentencing and the executing. Are you going to dispute that? Am I lying?"

traits.locale_text: “我看到了你对鲜血的渴望，你陶醉于宣判和处决。你打算反驳我吗？我是在撒谎吗？”

languages.text: 「お前は血が見たいらしい。判決を下し、処刑することに喜びを感じている。反論はあるか？{mf|俺|私}が間違っていると？」
languages.original_text: "I have seen your thirst for blood. You revel in the sentencing and the executing. Are you going to dispute that? Am I lying?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前は血が見たいらしい。判決を下し、処刑することに喜びを感じている。反論はあるか？{mf|俺|私}が間違っていると？」

languages.text: «He presenciado su sed de sangre. Encuentra placer sentenciando y ejecutando. ¿Lo va a negar? ¿Miento?».
languages.original_text: "I have seen your thirst for blood. You revel in the sentencing and the executing. Are you going to dispute that? Am I lying?"

traits.locale_text: «He presenciado su sed de sangre. Encuentra placer sentenciando y ejecutando. ¿Lo va a negar? ¿Miento?».

languages.text: "Ich habe Euren Blutdurst gesehen. Die Verurteilungen und die Hinrichtungen bereiten Euch Freude. Wollt Ihr das leugnen? Lüge ich?"
languages.original_text: "I have seen your thirst for blood. You revel in the sentencing and the executing. Are you going to dispute that? Am I lying?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Euren Blutdurst gesehen. Die Verurteilungen und die Hinrichtungen bereiten Euch Freude. Wollt Ihr das leugnen? Lüge ich?"

languages.text: « Vous avez votre soif de sang. Vous vous délectez des condamnations et les exécutions. Niez-vous ce fait ? »
languages.original_text: "I have seen your thirst for blood. You revel in the sentencing and the executing. Are you going to dispute that? Am I lying?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez votre soif de sang. Vous vous délectez des condamnations et les exécutions. Niez-vous ce fait ? »

languages.text: "Kana susamışlığını gördüm. Ceza vermek ve bu cezayı uygulamak sana haz veriyor. Bunu inkâr mı edeceksin? Yalan mı söylüyorum?"
languages.original_text: "I have seen your thirst for blood. You revel in the sentencing and the executing. Are you going to dispute that? Am I lying?"

traits.locale_text: "Kana susamışlığını gördüm. Ceza vermek ve bu cezayı uygulamak sana haz veriyor. Bunu inkâr mı edeceksin? Yalan mı söylüyorum?"
